name: 2D Shooter Final (TheAsianCow)
description:
Here is my well late 2D Shooter.  

Each level will have a totally different environment and different characters/enemies.  

Levels 2 and 3 have custom music that I made in Garage Band

Level 2 has a Medusa character that will always follow you(as well as shoot) and can't be killed.

Level 3 has a boss character where every enemy is invincible but him.

Credit to Ethan Plemmons
